scripts.go: pnpm install ; pnpm build:test ; pnpm start
scripts.cicd: pnpm build  && mkdir -p out1 && cp -rT out out1 && pnpm clean
scripts.build: pnpm clearup-serve && pnpm korpora && pnpm build-core && pnpm print && touch out/.nojekyll && node scripts/run-with-paths.js sh -c 'cp -avr ${SERVICE_PATH}/* out/ && cp -avr ${VREJI_PATH} out/' && pnpm cleanup
scripts.build:test: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' pnpm clearup-serve && next build && touch out/.nojekyll && node scripts/run-with-paths.js sh -c 'cp -avr ${SERVICE_PATH}/* out/ && cp -avr ${VREJI_PATH} out/' && pnpm cleanup
scripts.korpora: node scripts/run-with-paths.js sh -c 'rm -rf ${TMP_PATH}/korpora && mkdir -p ${TMP_PATH}/korpora && rm -rf ${MD_PAGES_PATH}/texts && mkdir -p ${MD_PAGES_PATH}/texts' && node lib/korpora/index.js
scripts.print: node scripts/run-with-paths.js sh -c 'mkdir -p ${VREJI_PATH}/uencu' && pnpm start & node lib/printer/wait-for-server.js && node lib/printer && node scripts/run-with-paths.js sh ./lib/printer/shrink-pdf.sh && pnpm clearup-serve
scripts.clearup-serve: lsof -t -i:3000 | xargs --no-run-if-empty kill -9 && next telemetry disable
